name: Explore like a local
description: A fun ride to the most popular tourist attractions in Saigon. Learn the history of each famous side. Unique way to enjoy all the sights and sounds of the city is by motorbike and walking. This fun scooter tour takes you to all corners of Saigon and helps you to maximize your sightseeing time. You will see nice view of Saigon on back of the Scooter and see how Saigonese works and lives.
